author: dantraMSFT
body:
## PR Summary
On Debian 9, libmi cannot resolve libssl and libcrypto.  This change adds symbolic links to packaging and build to the $PSHOME directory to resolve the issue.

The fix was verified interactively connecting to [office 365](https://outlook.office365.com/powershell-liveid), importing the session, and ensuring Get-MailBox and Get-User succeed.

Fix https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/7598

    - **OR**
    - [NA] [Make sure you've added a new test if existing tests do not effectively test the code changed](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#before-submitting)
        - [ ] [Add `[feature]` if the change is significant or affects feature tests](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/testing-guidelines/testing-guidelines.md#requesting-additional-tests-for-a-pr)
title: Add symbolic links for libssl and libcrypto to Debian 9 builds.
